net.coderazzi.filters.gui
Interface ITableFilterTextBasedEditor

All Superinterfaces:
ITableFilterEditor
All Known Implementing Classes:
TextChoiceFilterEditor, TextFilterEditor
public interface ITableFilterTextBasedEditor
extends ITableFilterEditor

Interface to be implemented by ITableFilterEditor instances that are based on a text parser.

Author:
Luis M Pena - dr.lu@coderazzi.net
